content.en: Synthetic medical images: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms, such as generative adversarial networks and deep learning, to generate synthetic medical images from different types of scans. These algorithms have the potential to improve image quality, correct imaging issues, and even replace missing sequences in medical imaging. By harnessing the power of artificial intelligence, scientists aim to enhance medical image processing and analysis, ultimately leading to better diagnosis and treatment of various conditions.
content.da: Syntetiske medicinske billeder: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer, såsom generative adversarielle netværk og dyb læring, til at generere syntetiske medicinske billeder fra forskellige typer scanninger. Disse algoritmer har potentiale til at forbedre billedkvaliteten, rette billedfejl og endda erstatte manglende sekvenser i medicinsk billeddannelse. Ved at udnytte kraften i kunstig intelligens sigter forskere mod at forbedre medicinsk billedbehandling og -analyse, hvilket i sidste ende fører til bedre diagnose og behandling af forskellige tilstande.
